name.en: Chapter 4 - Kyrie of the Forgotten Gods
name.jp: Chapter 4 - Kyrie of the Forgotten Gods
name.zh_cn: 为了被遗忘的神祇们的垂怜经

desc.en: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?
desc.jp: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?
desc.zh_cn: 被自己所属的学院抛弃的奥利斯小队——徘徊于憎恶与愤怒之间的她们，真的存在着慈悲吗？
